Interface VotesTransformer

All Known Implementing Classes:
CompositeVotesTransformer, DutchConstituencyVotesTransformer, DutchMunicipalityTransformer, DutchNationalVotesTransformer, DutchResultTransformer
public interface VotesTransformer
A VotesTransformer is responsible for transforming the data into the appropriate model classes.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    registerCandidateVotes(boolean aggregated, Map<String,String> electionData)
    Called whenever either a Selection closing tag is parsed and there is either a CandidateIdentifier-Id or CandidateIdentifier-ShortCode key is present.
    void
    registerMetadata(boolean aggregated, Map<String,String> electionData)
    Called whenever either a TotalVotes or ReportingUnitVotes closing tag is parsed.
    void
    registerPartyVotes(boolean aggregated, Map<String,String> electionData)
    Called whenever either a Selection closing tag is parsed and there is no CandidateIdentifier-Id or CandidateIdentifier-ShortCode key is present.

  • Method Details

    • registerPartyVotes

      void registerPartyVotes(boolean aggregated, Map<String,String> electionData)
      Called whenever either a Selection closing tag is parsed and there is no CandidateIdentifier-Id or CandidateIdentifier-ShortCode key is present.
      Parameters:
      aggregated - true when the votes at the aggregation level are processed, false otherwise.
      electionData - the tags and values.

    • registerCandidateVotes

      void registerCandidateVotes(boolean aggregated, Map<String,String> electionData)
      Called whenever either a Selection closing tag is parsed and there is either a CandidateIdentifier-Id or CandidateIdentifier-ShortCode key is present.
      Parameters:
      aggregated - true when the votes at the aggregation level are processed, false otherwise.
      electionData - the tags and values.

    • registerMetadata

      void registerMetadata(boolean aggregated, Map<String,String> electionData)
      Called whenever either a TotalVotes or ReportingUnitVotes closing tag is parsed.
      Parameters:
      aggregated - true when the votes at the aggregation level are processed, false otherwise.
      electionData - the tags and values.
